description:
Kaoru is serving as captain of an expedition mission to search for an aradama in the northern Kanto region under the orders of Director Sana. Lacking motivation Kaoru leaves the search for the aradama up to her subordinates and indulges herself in some comforts. Finally, Director Sana sends in Sayaka to act as a watchdog for Kaoru to make sure the job gets done.
Source: crunchyroll
